org.treetank.access
Class NodeWriteTrx

java.lang.Object
  org.treetank.access.NodeWriteTrx
All Implemented Interfaces:
INodeReadTrx, INodeWriteTrx
public class NodeWriteTrx
extends Object
implements INodeWriteTrx

NodeWriteTrx

Single-threaded instance of only write transaction per session.

All methods throw NullPointerExceptions in case of null values for reference parameters.

Author:
Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz

remove

public void remove()
            throws TTException
Remove currently selected node. This does automatically remove descendants. The cursor is located at the former right sibling. If there was no right sibling, it is located at the former left sibling. If there was no left sibling, it is located at the former parent.

Specified by:
remove in interface INodeWriteTrx
Throws:
TTException - if node couldn't be removed

revertTo

public void revertTo(long paramRevision)
              throws TTException
Reverting all changes to the revision defined. This command has to be finalized with a commit. A revert is always bound to a INodeReadTrx#moveToDocumentRoot().

Specified by:
revertTo in interface INodeWriteTrx
Parameters:
paramRevision - revert to the revision
Throws:
TTUsageException - if paramRevision < 0 or paramRevision > maxCommitedRev
TTIOException - if an I/O operation fails
TTException - if couldn't revert to revision
